/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React from 'react' import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; export default function ForBusines() { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors } } = useForm(); const onSubmit = data => { console.log(data); } return (

Let’s talk about Busines

Ask us everything and we would love to hear from you

{errors.name && errors.name.type === "required" && This is required} {errors.name && errors.name.type === "maxLength" && Max length exceeded}
{errors.email && errors.email.type === "required" && (

enter email

)} {errors.email && errors.email.type === "pattern" && (

enter email pattern wrong

)}
{errors.CompanyName && errors.CompanyName.type === "required" && (

Enter Company Name

)}
{errors.number && errors.number.type === "required" && (

Enter contact number

)}

Chennai. India

0123456789

careers@cliqhr.co.in

Follow us

) }
